"A.P.242/2/17/11:00": "Ha... ha... What are these things...?! I've never seen anything like them...!"
"They're difficult to damage."
"They're abnormally resilient."
"Yeah... and they react similarly to how Shiva did."

"Repelling our attacks, or absorbing them
somehow..."
"Maria! Watch out!"
"...Ah, it's you lot. Thanks for that."
"Where's everyone else...?"
"I'm looking for them too. Glad I ran into you first."
"You're worth the most points."
"Huh?"
"Get down!"
"Tch!"
"...Don't let them fool you! That's not Maria!"
"Zeno?! You're hurt...!"
"Oh? You must be quite the specimen to take one of my blows and live."
"That was nothing compared to the real deal. Quit it with the crappy copy already, you faker!"
"It was not lacking. My mimicry is perfect."
"You're...!"
"You were with Shiva...!"
"You can mimic other people...?!"
"I am Mitra. One of the twenty, Goddess of Imitation. I exist to imitate."
"I ran into her earlier!"
"And so did I, just after."
"Suspicion will kill. It's laughable how people suspect one another."
"You'll have to be suspicious of everyone you meet from now on. Wondering whether your friends are really your friends."
"I have seen it happen every time. And now, I will see it happen once again."
"The Imitation Goddess kills people."

"Heh, thanks for the friendly explanation! So
you're saying all we have to do is take you down!"
"You're worth a lot of points. If I take them, I win."
"Points...?"
"We're having a match to see who can kill more of you. I'm behind, and with this I can catch up."
"...Quit messing around! We're not just some toys for you to play with!"
"Why such anger? You've done the same to the Darkers."
"How does it feel to become the hunted? Consider it karma."
"Tell me... Do you understand how that feels?"
